title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/12/22
itunes:title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/12/22
description:
George Noory and Dr. Jeffrey Long explore his research into near death experiences, how people find proof of life after death when their physical body dies, and the impact it has on their lives even if they weren't religious before it happened.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
